column4: hmm.. amsn does seem to take up a lot of resources, doesn't it
Java does that.
happen to know any alternatives that still have proper msn support?
Unless you truely care for webcam support and the ocassional... custom emotion, Gaim/Pidgin works.
Gaim has file send/receive, right?
Yep, was sending zips a plenty yesterday.
could you get a display pic of yourself up as well?
Yup.
If you want to test stuff with me, I'll be happy to add you.
it's okay, wouldn't wanna trouble you so much, but how'd you set up a display pic in Gaim? i didn't see the option
I updated my GAIM to pidgin, let me open my old copy quickly.
Bottom right, the little photo thing.
upgraded? is pidgin better tehn?
Well, it's just that gaim is discontinued, so, I went to pidgin.
oh okay. does pidgin show 'MSN nickname quotes' ?
I'm pretty sure, you mean that little text under the name? Yeah.
k. will get that. so i apt-get install pidgin?
Not in the repo yet, you'll have to download it from a website.
http://www.getdeb.net/release.php?id=1045
kay. thanks.
so what do i do with .deb file again? dpkg -i filename?
If you download it, GDebi or another package manager should do it.
